name: El Goblino Trails
description:
Banish El Goblino before it gets you

This game is dedicated to xQc! If you like him you'll recognize a lot of references in the game.

GAMEPLAY:

  • Defend Yourself & Survive
  • Intense Chases
  • Multiple endings
  • Gamba

DEFEND YOURSELF

There are multiple ways to survive. Watch the live CCTV footage carefully to determine where El Goblino is traveling. Set up traps while they're away but don't get caught without a weapon.

KEEP EL GOBLINO AT BAY

El Goblino will find any way to get in including going down your chimney. Make sure the fireplace is always lit or else they'll get in.

__________________________________________________________________________________

WANT MORE?

This is a free game to show appreciation to my favorite Twitch Streamer. If you'd like to support me as a developer, you can check out my other horror game here on Itch.io or on Steam! :)
